item.description:
ABC WORKOUT:  (Andre's Boot Camp):  For this night the Boot Camp has been changed to Zumba Toning.  You do not need to bring your mats.  Please bring light weights" 1-3 lbs.

The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

56 Arbor St, Suite 103 , Hartford, CT

(It is in the same building as Real Artways)

Bring Water, towel, sneakers and a pilates/yoga mat.weights.    Experience Zumba Fitness with a little "weight".

5 Drop in Fee; $40 for 10-Class Card.

Directions: I-84 West, Sission Avenue Exit, Take a left on Sission Ave. Take a left on Capitol Ave. The 3rd right is Arbor St.  It is in the same buildingas Real Artways.  Use the side green door entrance.  There is plenty of parking in the back.

group.name: Zumba Fitness @ The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.name: ABC Workout in Hartford CT changed to Zumba Toning
